params.note: Day 3: Tissue clusters containing no NRs (top row); NRs <250 μm in diameter (middle two rows); and multiple NRs (bottom two rows) post-isolation.
Day 7: Tissue clusters containing no NRs (top row); NRs <250 μm in diameter (middle two rows); and multiple NRs (bottom two rows) post-isolation.
Day 14: Tissue clusters containing no NRs (top row); NRs <250 μm in diameter (middle two rows); and multiple NRs (bottom two rows) post-isolation.
Scale bar: 250 μm for representative images of unsuccessful differentiation into SNR-derived organoids.
Protocol differs from others by starting with carefully isolated SNRs instead of dissociated pluripotent or neural stem cell aggregates.
Isolated SNRs retain self-organization in suspension culture, giving rise to organoids with single rosettes.
MG-embedded SNR-derived organoids imaged at: immediately (a), 2 d (b), 20 d (c), 2 months (d), 3 months (e), and 4 months (f,g) after embedding.
Scale bars: 1 mm for MG-embedded organoid images.
